network.name: fire Application
network.node: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><node:node xmlns:node="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/node" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu node.xsd"> <name>fireGarTherm</name> <description>All purpose node for a fire app.</description> <platform xlink:href="../../middleware/components/platforms/pc_">pc_</platform> <communication xlink:href="../../middleware/components/communications/zigbee">zigbee</communication> <entity xlink:href="../../middleware/components/entities/GUIObject">GUIObject</entity> <resources> <resource><res:resource xmlns:res="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/resource" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu resource.xsd"> <name>fireMultiNode_res</name> <description>This is the resource description generated automatically on 2009.06.30 at 13:53:00 by the POBICOS Node Integrator Console. It is based on the 'fireMultiNode.xml' node configuration file.</description> <primitives> <instruction> <definition><instr:instruction xmlns:instr="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/instruction" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu instruction.xsd"> <name>pongiGetTemp</name> <id>0x11500000</id> <ontologyURI>http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/onto/pobicos#getTemp</ontologyURI> <description>Acquire information about the temperature level</description> <result> <label>Temperature</label> <ontologyURI>http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/onto/pobicos#Temperature</ontologyURI> <type>uint32_t</type> <description>Temperature, expressed in 1/100th of a degree Celsius</description> </result></instr:instruction></definition> <implementation xlink:href="../../middleware/components/resources/implementation1">implementation1</implementation> </instruction> </primitives></res:resource></resource> </resources> <descriptors> <descriptor><descr:descriptor xmlns:descr="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/descriptor" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu descriptor.xsd"> <name>PONGO_LOCATION_GARAGE</name> <id>0x22212000</id> <ontologyURI>http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/onto/pobicos#Garage</ontologyURI> <description>Garage - a place where vehicles are kept</description></descr:descriptor></descriptor> <descriptor><descr:descriptor xmlns:descr="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/descriptor" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.ict-pobicos.eu descriptor.xsd"> <name>PONGO_PRODUCT_THERMOMETER</name> <id>0x24110000</id> <ontologyURI>http://www.ict-pobicos.eu/onto/pobicos#Thermometer</ontologyURI> <description>Thermometer - a device which measures the level of temperature</description></descr:descriptor></descriptor> </descriptors></node:node>
